item.title: Wooden bollard snapped off and missing on corner of street, 24th June
item.description:
Wooden bollard on edge of pavement has been snapped off on the Kirkham/ Flaxtoncorner end leaving a hole where it used to be and no wooden bollard. Needs replacement. Road safe issue / helpful to have it there. Outside house 93 flaxton
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kirkham Street, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paving and driveway signs stuck to lamppost, 24th June
item.description:
Company has added hoarding sign to lamppost advertising their business. Irish paving and landscaping firm. Pavilllion drives. Stuck up high on the lamppost facing the Slade park near garland road but on plumstead common road itself. You can see it coming out from the park looking towards the ravine.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead Common Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New speed bumps causing house to shake, 24th June
item.description:
There is a new speed bump outside our house & every 5 mins when the 242 bus drives over the bump, the house shakes violently. Can you please look into this? Can we get a speed camera instead? We have 2 young children & this will cause structural damage
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Powerscroft Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 24th June
item.description:
Dumped rubbish near the aley that conect Millfield Close and Station Approach. Please send someone to clear the area otherwise we risk this area to become a landfill. People keep throwing bags of rubbish and no one sems to care. Also lots of litter on the aley. No one cleaned the aley for weeks. Who is responsible for this. Why we pay council tax so high if no one in cleaning the area. Hope this time someone will come and fix the problem, not like last time when I've done a complain and I was ignored and the situation become worse. Please send someone!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Millfields Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
